assignments.description: Assigns the Appropriate Patient/Provider Parameters for the second progress note being signed to a different location than the first note. This is required because we are bypassing flow configuration screens during the second note, and need to pass in the correct parameters to the Get Apex Actions subflow
assignments.name: PC_Assign_Parameters_for_Second_PC_Progress_Note
assignments.label: Assign Parameters for Second PC Progress Note

assignments.description: After Successfully signing the Progress Note originally being passed into this flow, This overwrites the Record Id with the Id of the Second Provider Connect Progress Note. This will connect back to the beginning of the flow and run the Second note through the Sign Note process.
assignments.name: Reassign_recordId
assignments.label: Reassign recordId

decisions.description: Depending on which Case Outcome was chosen in the previous screen, A different Case Outcome Detail Picklist was used. It needs to be determined which field value needs to be stored based on the options chosen, so that the record can be updated accordingly.
decisions.name: Case_Outcome_Detail_Assignment_Signpost
decisions.label: Case Outcome Detail Assignment Signpost

decisions.description: If the field VCC_Relative_Type is blank and the Progress Note Record Type is either: VCC_Virtual_Visit_Progress_Note, TUC_Virtual_Visit, TUC_Chart_Review, TUC_Consultation_with_Triage_RN, PC_Provider_Connect_Progress_Note, the field will be considered not blank to bypass the Caller Recipient Relation to Patient Subflow Path.
decisions.name: Check_Caller_Relation
decisions.label: Check Caller Relation

decisions.description: Return to previous screen if no facility was selected and
decisions.name: Check_Facility_Selected

rules.name: Need_to_Verify_Emergency_Contact_and_Address
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 6 OR 7 OR 10 OR (8 AND 9)) AND (4 AND 5)
rules.label: Need to Verify Emergency Contact and Address

decisions.label: Which Case Outcome Field Used

Flow.description:
This flow is the main flow containing all Sign Note-related subflows. It is launched by quick action on both Addendum and Progress Note record pages. Release 1.10.1 - Updated input variable for Close Case Subflow (CCCM-31138) CRM 1.10 Added Checkboxes variables to the Code Assignment Subflow and Update fields.
CRM 1.10- This flow is updated to bypass various screens for Scheduling/Admin, Pharm I and Pharm II, CT Progress Notes when the Progress Note is Transferred in ownership when a VA Employee leaves. Added decisions/assignment and updated an update records to only assign certain fields if a certain record type is edited (VCV, PHARM, VCV). Tele-EC 1.11.0 Update to 'Check Caller Relation' Decision Element conditions; to bypass Caller Relation Subflow and Pop-up for all Tele-EC Progress Note Record Types Tele-EC 1.12.0 Update to 'Tele-EC Close Case Outcome'; to use the TED_Reason_for_Referral picklist instead of leaving the box as a text box. Assigning Case Close subflow back to ProgressNoteRecord.Id SS-1.12.0 e911 Record Update Release 1.14.0 Tele-EC Remove Closed by (PC_Veteran_Member_ID__c field) when updating closed records. Release 1.14.0 BugOutcomes, add Outcomes without dependencies connector Release 1.14.0 CCCM-37603 - Added progress note ID to GetVisitRelatedTos Apex Action Release 1.15.0 - PTEMSPC-1673- Multiple Changes to provide Functionality for the Provider Connect Module. Release 1.16.0 - CCCM-31263 - Das Sign Note Flow Changes Release 1.20.0 - PTEMSTUC-3113: Case Outcome Detail not loading through out Tele-EC case Release 1.20.0 - PTEMSPC-2361: Adds functionality to sign a second Provider Connect Progress Note to a different Site Id than the first note.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Listing of CPT codes using the CPT to Progress Note Mapping

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This Choice resource is for the Tele-EC Close Case Outcome Screen holding the TED_Reason_for_Referral PickList. (Case Reason)

formulas.name: checkforpharmuser

formulas.description: Current User First and Last Name

formulas.description: Pulls the FLP's SiteId from the PC Case. Converts it from text to Number to be used for comparison throughout the flow.

formulas.description: Pulls the Specialists SiteId from the PC Case. Converts it from text to Number to be used for comparison throughout the flow.
formulas.name: fx_PC_Specialist_SiteId

formulas.description: Formula created for test instances. Since we cannot sign to two different locations when operating under Mock SSO. This formula will dynamically adjust the Site id for test environment vs production.
formulas.name: fx_Second_PN_SiteId

formulas.description: Converts the PID to a number format. Specific to the second Provider Connect Progress Note
formulas.name: fxPCLocalPID

formulas.description: Determines if any of the no show checkbox options have been checked
formulas.name: No_Show_Visible

formulas.description: Criteria determines if Diagnosis Code is required to sign a Progress Note
formulas.name: Primary_Diagnosis_Code_Required

formulas.description: Criteria determines if Primary Diagnosis Code field should be visible when signing a Progress Note.
formulas.name: Primary_Diagnosis_Code_Visible

formulas.description: Criteria determines if Secondary Diagnosis Code field should be visible when signing a Progress Note.
formulas.name: Secondary_Diagnosis_Code_Visible

formulas.description: This formula will output the VISN number of the Clinic/Location chosen by the user ONLY IF duplicate patient records are found but none are selected.
formulas.name: VisnNumberForSignScreenPrompt

recordLookups.description: Retrieves the Provider Connect Config Settings Metadata to determine if Second Note Functionality is currently Enabled or not.

recordLookups.description: Retrieves the Second Provider Connect Progress Note that is related to the same Provider Connect Case. There will already be a second PN created because the Specialist and FLP Site ID on PC_Case record are different.

recordLookups.description: If Mock SSO is NOT enabled, this retrieves the real VistA Instance to User DUZ record specific to the Second Provider Connect Progress Note.

recordLookups.description: Gets the Note Title IEN Specific to the Second Provider Connect Progress Note

recordLookups.description: Retrieves the orgs Mock SSO Settings specific to the Second Provider Connect Progress Note.

A Second Note is Required


Your signature is required to update the electronic health record at the patients site.


Your Site: {!ProgressNoteRecord.PC_Case__r.Assigned_Specialist__r.PC_Location__r.Name}


Patients Site: {!ProgressNoteRecord.PC_Case__r.FLP_Location__r.Name}
